name: Bite Night
description:
Bite Night it's a 3D action game where your need to spread the zombie curse!

Touch someone with your cursed mouse and watch them transform into something terrible! Sit and enjoy watching how the curse spreads around the map.

Use the cursed hearts in the shop to upgrade your creatures, curse everyone and win!

TEAM
Aniol Andrés - Programmer - Twitter 
Albert Val - Programmer - Twitter
Alfonso Mestres - Design & programmer- Twitter
